description: Students whose clinical performance would benefit from additional clinical exposure in order to demonstrate the expected competencies are, with course faculty and faculty advisor approval, eligible to register for NURS 799. This experience will be allotted no more than one credit unit and must be completed in a time frame not to exceed one academic semester. A course may be remediated only one time.
name: MSN CLINICAL REMEDIATION: FOUNDATIONS OF ACUTE CARE CLINICAL PRACTICE
